title: Hamilton Beach 2-Way FlexBrew Coffee Maker at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: Maximize your brewing options with the Hamilton Beach 2-Way FlexBrew Coffee Maker. Featuring a 12-cup carafe and single serve brewing of ground coffee or K-Cups®, FlexBrew offers the best of both worlds in one compact, convenient unit. Thanks for watching.
